div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 908 Meričleri environs, c. 25 km. N of (675) Haskovo, Bulgaria, 1909 Burial: c. 125-100 B.C. (T) Contents: 4 AR Macedonia, 1st Region: 2 tetradr. Thasos: 2 spread-flan tetradr. (with Μ) Lysimachus: 1 post. tetradr. (Byzantium) Disposition: dispersed Filow, BSAB 1 (1910), p. 227 See no. 909 below
